moves.3. Nf3 Nc6 4. Bg5: The queen is vulnerable from the beginning.
moves.4... Qg6 5. e3 h6 6. Bd3 f5 7. Bf4 Bd6 8: After much queenattacks I decided to just exchange them.
That was the rook, or the pawn who was too close.
moves.13. Bxg6+: I did it too fast, later on i saw 13. Nxc6 b/dxc6 14. Bxg6+ was better.
moves.26... Ra7 27. Rxd6 Ke7 28. Rxb6 Rb7: Good try, but not good enough.
moves.32... Rb6 33. Rd7+: Near mate here, Kc8 gives fastest mate, Kb8 looses the rook.
moves.34. Ra8+ Rb8 35. Raa7: Mate with Rac7 or needed to be blocked by rook loss.
